mapper.sql: dd_id, id, paymentmethod, dgname, `number`, munit, `status`, rname, creat_time
mapper.insert: insert into drugs_deposit (id, paymentmethod, dgname, `number`, munit, `status`, rname, creat_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{munit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into drugs_deposit
id,
paymentmethod,
dgname,
`number`,
munit,
`status`,
rname,
creat_time,

mapper.update:
update drugs_deposit
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paymentmethod = #{paymentmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dgname = #{dgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
munit = #{munit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where dd_id = #{ddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update drugs_deposit set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paymentmethod = #{paymentmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dgname = #{dgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, munit = #{munit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where dd_id = #{ddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select B.dd_id,B.id,B.paymentmethod,B.dgname,B.number,B.munit,B.status,B.rname,B.creat_time,P.oldpeople_name from drugs_deposit B inner join jd_oldpeople P on B.id = P.oldpeople_id
